app.name: MMIT Lab
app.title: MMIT Lab - Hardware Testing Suite
app.description: Comprehensive hardware testing made simple and accessible

webcam.name: Camera Test
webcam.description: Test your camera by checking if video feed appears correctly and all cameras work.

microphone.name: Microphone Test
microphone.description: Test your microphone by speaking and checking if audio levels are detected.

speakers.name: Speaker Test
speakers.description: Test your speakers by playing sounds and verifying audio output.

keyboard.name: Keyboard Test
keyboard.description: Test your keyboard by pressing keys and verifying they register correctly.

mouse.name: Mouse Test
mouse.description: Test your mouse by clicking buttons and scrolling to verify functionality.

touch.name: Touch Test
touch.description: Test your touchscreen by completing interactive touch challenges.

battery.name: Battery Test
battery.description: Test your battery and charging functionality by following the instructions.

completed.name: All Tests Complete
completed.description: Review your test results and download the complete report.

info.grantPermission: Please grant permission to access device

about.title: About MMIT Lab
about.subtitle: Comprehensive hardware testing made simple and accessible

what_is_mmit.title: What is MMIT Lab?
paragraphs: MMIT Lab is a comprehensive hardware testing suite designed to help users thoroughly test their devices and ensure optimal performance. Our platform provides easy-to-use tests for cameras, microphones, speakers, keyboards, mice, touchscreens, and battery systems.

Whether you're troubleshooting hardware issues, verifying device functionality before a purchase, or conducting routine maintenance checks, MMIT Lab provides the tools you need in a simple, intuitive interface.

camera.title: Camera Testing
camera.description: Test multiple cameras, check video quality, and verify camera switching functionality.

audio.title: Audio Testing
audio.description: Comprehensive microphone and speaker tests with real-time audio level monitoring.

input.title: Input Testing
input.description: Test keyboard keys, mouse buttons, scroll wheels, and touchscreen responsiveness.

battery.title: Battery Testing
battery.description: Monitor battery health, charging status, and power management capabilities.

performance.title: Performance Monitoring
performance.description: Real-time performance metrics and Web Vitals monitoring for optimal experience.

reports.title: Detailed Reports
reports.description: Export comprehensive test results in multiple formats (PDF, JSON, CSV).

issues.title: Report Issues
issues.description: Found a bug or have a suggestion?

credits.title: Credits & Acknowledgments
credits.description: MMIT Lab is made possible thanks to the open-source community and various web standards that enable hardware access through browsers.
thanks_list: Web Platform Team for MediaDevices API

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page.

update_available.title: Update Available
update_available.message: A new version of the application is available. Please reload to get the latest version.

network.title: Connection Problem
network.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.

permission.camera_enable_settings: Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings and try again.
permission.microphone_enable_settings: Please enable microphone permissions in your browser settings and try again.
permission.speaker_enable_settings: Please enable speaker permissions in your browser settings and try again.

device.camera_not_connected: No cameras were detected on your system. Please ensure your camera is properly connected.
device.microphone_not_connected: No microphones were detected on your system. Please ensure your microphone is properly connected.
device.speaker_not_connected: No speakers were detected on your system. Please ensure your speakers are properly connected.
device.browser_not_support_battery: Your browser doesn't support battery status detection.

errors.autoplay_policy: Please click the speaker buttons to start audio playback. Browser requires user interaction for audio.

permission.camera_grant_access: Please allow camera access to test your webcam.
permission.microphone_grant_access: Please allow microphone access to test your microphone.

detection.please_wait_search: Please wait while we search for available {deviceType}
detection.searching_devices: Please wait while we search for available {deviceType}s
detection.no_devices_message: No {deviceType}s were found on your system.

webcam.live_feed: Live camera feed for testing purposes

touchTest.startPrompt: Tap anywhere to start the touch test
touchTest.dragChallenge: Drag the circle to the target
touchTest.completeMessage: Your touchscreen has been successfully tested

alerts.pdfGenerationError: Error generating PDF. Please try again.

step1.title: Step 1: Connect Charger
step1.description: Please connect your charger to begin the test.

step2.title: Unplug Charger
step2.description: Please unplug your charger to continue.

keyboard.mobile_description: The keyboard test is designed for physical keyboards and is not available on mobile devices. This test requires a hardware keyboard to properly detect key presses and validate functionality.
mobile_options: Use a desktop or laptop computer for the full keyboard test
Skip this test if you're on a mobile device
Return to the test menu to continue with other device tests

web_vitals.title: Web Vitals Dashboard
web_vitals.description: Monitor your website's Core Web Vitals and performance metrics in real-time.

lcp.name: Largest Contentful Paint
lcp.description: Time to render the largest content element

fid.name: First Input Delay
fid.description: Time from first interaction to browser response

ttfb.name: Time to First Byte
ttfb.description: Time to first byte from server

about.title: About Web Vitals
content: Core Web Vitals are a set of real-world, user-centered metrics that quantify key aspects of the user experience. They measure dimensions of web usability such as load time, interactivity, and the stability of content as it loads.
Note: Some metrics may require user interaction to be measured accurately. Interact with the page and refresh metrics to get complete readings.
